SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.socketMiddleware

Class ClientSkeleton

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.socketMiddleware.ClientSkeleton
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client, Remote
public class ClientSkeleton extends Object implements Client
This class represents the Client's skeleton, it is necessary for the correct functioning of the Server It contains for pinging the client, updating the model view, receiving exceptions, ... and also displaying modifies to the current client's implementation. It implements the client-server communication using sockets.
